VIDAVO.AT.summary: Vidavo S.A. designs, develops, and provides connected health, wellness, and healthy ageing solutions. The company offers Vida24, a cloud based platform and customizable app that synchs multi-source data. Its platform provides chronic disease management, doctor on demand, nutrition management, e-health and wellness, marine telemedicine, behavioral change, insurance, personal development, scientific wellness, and digital therapeutic solutions. The company was founded in 2002 and is headquartered in Thessaloniki, Greece.
